snippet: Investigators say that Mahuddin Mahmud, 57, was probably murdered and that they are looking for a tenant they describe as a “person of interest.”
abstract: Nearly decapitated body of Brooklyn landord Mahuddin Mahmud is found in the basement of a building he owned; New York homicide detectives are looking for tenant whose surname is Siddiquee, who lived in basement of Mahmud’s three-story building at 546 McDonald Avenue in Brooklyn’s Kensington neighborhood; there is no immediate word of a possible motive for the killing,
lead_paragraph: Investigators say that Mahuddin Mahmud, 57, was probably murdered and that they are looking for a tenant they describe as a “person of interest.”

headline.main: Body of a Brooklyn Landlord Is Discovered in a Basement
headline.print_headline: Body of a Brooklyn Landlord Is Discovered in a Basement
